verses.roman:
"tava kathāmṛtaṁ" śloka rājā ye paḍila
uṭhi' premāveśe prabhu āliṅgana kaila

synonyms: tava kathāmṛtam—beginning with the words tava kathāmṛtam; śloka—the verse; rājā—the King; ye paḍila—as he recited; uṭhi'-getting up; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āliṅgana kaila—embraced.
translation: As soon as the King recited the verse beginning with the words "tava kathāmṛtam," the Lord immediately arose in ecstatic love and embraced him.
